attributes.action: All three main party leaders to have A televised debate for the 2015 General Election.
attributes.additional_details:
All of the party leaders want be Prime Minister. I think its only right that they have to have a televised debate, (similar format to the 2010 election) where party leaders can let the electorate know what they are about.
Politics should be accessible  and TV is the best way to suit the demographic's of the country.
